title: Number of Pokémon GO daily users in the U.S. 2016
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of users in millions in the y axis.
The Number of users in millions is highest at Month July 19 and lowest at Month July 12.
The highest Month July 19 has 24.0 more Number of users in millions than the lowest Month July 12.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of users in millions in the y axis.
The Number of users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month July 19 and lowest at Month July 12.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of users in millions in the y axis.
The Number of users in millions is highest at Month July 19 and lowest at Month July 12.
The highest Month July 19 has 24.0 more Number of users in millions than the lowest Month July 12.
max_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of users in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The Number of users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month July 19 and lowest at Month July 12.
Second maximum Number of users in millions is found at Month August 16.
The highest Month July 19 has 24.0 more Number of users in millions than the lowest Month July 12.
Number of users in millions at Month July 19 is 45.0 , second place is August 16 at 30.0, and thirdly is July 14 at 25.0.
Over the past 4 Months, the Number of users in millions has declined.
The highest value 45.0 at July 19 is almost 1.49 times larger than the average value 30.25.
The Number of users in millions is 121.0 if we add up values of all Months.
